ALBA GROUP lawyers have experience of successful representation of clients’ interests in courts of general jurisdiction and arbitration courts of all levels in the most regions of the Russian Federation (including the Supreme court of the Russian Federation and Supreme Arbitration court of the Russian Federation), the Republics of Kazakhstan, the Kyrgyz Republic (including the Constitutional court of KR, the Supreme court of KR).

Besides, legal company ALBA GROUP on a regular basis cooperates with the lawyers practising in various regions of the Russian Federation, Republic of Kazakhstan, the Kyrgyz Republic.

ALBA GROUP provides complex legal support of clients at various stages of settlement of disputable situations:

  • a pre-judicial stage of settlement of disputes:
    • working out of effective strategy of settlement of a disputable situation,
    • legal support of clients at negotiation within the pre-trial disputes resolution;

  • proceedings:
    • representation of clients’ interests in arbitration courts (all instances),
    • representation of clients’ interests in courts of general jurisdiction (all instances),
    • representation of clients’ interests in the arbitration courts,
    • participation in preparation and representation of clients’ interests in international permanent and ad hoc arbitration, preparation of legal opinion,
    • assessment of possibilities for debt recovery, and also a package plan with regard to debtor’s assets search and assistance in taking of interim measures,
    • legal support of clients at healing measures,
    • legal support at enforcement proceedings,
    • Clients’ advice on all issues relating to consideration of disputes in a judicial procedure;

  • execution of foreign arbitration awards and judgements in Russia and CIS countries as well as executions of decisions of arbitration and arbitration tribunals of Russia and CIS countries in Russia / CIS and abroad.

High performance of clients’ orders at the resolution of disputes is provided both by professional competence of our experts, and long-term experience of implementation by our experts and lawyers of professional activity directly in regions.
